characters.name: Aric
characters.description: Stealthy Night Elf rogue, moves through the shadows with grace and precision.

characters.name: Elinor
characters.description: Seasoned dwarf warrior with a long, braided beard and a sturdy frame, is known for her unmatched strength on the battlefield.

characters.name: Teddy
characters.description: Young hunter with great potential, Teddy, possesses an innate connection to the wild that belies his tender years.

characters.name: Seraphina
characters.description: Elegant High Elf mage, harnesses the power of arcane magic with finesse and wisdom.

characters.name: Evelyn
characters.description: Evelyn is a graceful Wood Elf ranger, attuned to nature and skilled with both bow and blade.

characters.name: Gideon
characters.description: Gideon is an energetic Human sorcerer who wields the power of storms with a flair for dramatic spells.
